Mark a special occasion – Makes a houghtful Valentine's Day or Mother's Day gift to show that special someone just how much you care; compatible with the LEGO Flower Bouquet sets
Custom flower decoration – Kids can arrange the stems and leaves of this LEGO artificial flowers set to create a customised sunflower decoration
body.description: Sunflowers bring instant cheer and optimism to their surroundings, and now you can build your own model version of this beloved flower with the vibrant LEGO Sunflowers (40524) building kit. These artificial flowers make for great home décor as they brighten up the room and inspire creativity. Create an eye catching sunflower display or make a mixed bouquet by adding the LEGO Flower Bouquet (10280), LEGO Roses (40460) or LEGO Tulips (40461) flower building toy sets (sold separately). It also makes a great sunflower gift for Valentine's Day, Mother’s Day, anniversaries or an anytime treat for a friend or loved one. Contains 191 pieces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars THESE ARE NOT SEEDS
reviews.reviewText: I am trying to start gardening. Yes I know it's winter! That's not the problem. I wanted to plant sunflowers. These look like sunflowers but aren't seeds. They're little plastic blocks. I followed the instructions and put it together, I thought it was odd they didnt require any dirt, but oh well. NOT SEEDS.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars LEGO Sunflowers Building Kit Review: A Charming, Yet Petite Floral Masterpiece
reviews.reviewText: The LEGO Sunflowers Building Kit is an enchanting addition to any LEGO enthusiast's collection, meriting a solid four-star rating. Upon first glance, the kit impresses with its attention to detail and the clever use of LEGO bricks to capture the essence of these beloved flowers. The color scheme is vibrant, accurately reflecting the cheerful yellow and green hues that sunflowers are known for. The assembly process is both intuitive and enjoyable, offering a satisfying building experience that is accessible to both seasoned builders and newcomers to the hobby.However, it's worth noting that the final product may be a bit smaller than some might expect. While the diminutive size does not detract from the overall aesthetic appeal of the set, those anticipating a more substantial display piece might find themselves slightly disappointed. This slight drawback aside, the LEGO Sunflowers Building Kit remains a delightful representation of nature's beauty, perfectly encapsulating the charm of sunflowers in a compact and display-worthy format.In summary, the LEGO Sunflowers Building Kit is a beautifully designed set that captures the essence of its real-life counterpart with remarkable accuracy and creativity. Although its size may fall short of some expectations, its visual appeal and the enjoyable building experience it offers make it a worthy addition to any collection. Whether displayed alone or as part of a larger botanical collection, these LEGO sunflowers bring a touch of sunshine and happiness to any room.
